directions: Beat ricotta cheese, cream, and vanilla extract together in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Spread ricotta mixture onto a platter; top with figs, strawberries, and plum slices. Drizzle honey over the fruit and sprinkle black pepper over the top. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: 3 plums, pitted and sliced into eighths
freshly cracked black pepper to taste
3 sprigs fresh mint, or more to taste
title: Whipped Ricotta with Honey and Summer Fruit
